sectionCappArea: Restricted to James Scholars Program students.
sectionFeeAmount: James Scholars Field Trip $300.00 Flat Fee.
sectionText: This course, developed for FAA James Scholar students, explores the arts and culture in a major American City.  The purpose is to examine, discuss and experience the American urban landscape from a cultural and historical perspective.  The eight week course culminates in a week-long visit to a major American city.  During the visit, students will examine the city as a lived space, investigating its architecture, built environment, and public art along with experiencing live performances of dancers, musicians and actors.  The course will expose FAA James Scholars to a wide range of visual, performance and environmental arts events in the city.
